WorkItem.ClosedComment:
As part of our move to GitHub, we're closing our CodePlex issues and suggestions and asking that people move them to the GitHub issue tracker for further discussion.  Some issues and feature requests may already be active on GitHub, so please make sure to look for an existing issue before filing a new one.

You can find our GitHub issue tracker here:
https://github.com/microsoft/typeScript/issues
WorkItem.Description:
The host interface provided to the compiler for reference resolution (IReferenceResolverHost) assumes the host can do things synchronously.

While this may be true for special cases (eg: node.js using the fs.*Sync functions), it's not applicable to all scenarios - such as (but not limited to) resolving remote files, using certain VFS systems, etc.

Comments.Message: Assigning to TS_Community - we'd take a pull request on this, but this would be a low priority for us otherwise.
